about_the_game:
Rad Ralph stole Chester's Sacred Carrot and wiped out his herd. Now Chester must get the revenge. Take Rad Ralph's lieutenants down one by one and crush your enemies. Become the world's most badass guinea pig.

Retro Gameplay

  • Chester’s Revenge is a retro-style 2d Shooter with a strong design emphasis on precision platforming, intense combat, and epic boss fights.
  • Inspired by modern classics such as Cuphead and traditional classics such as Mega Man.
  • Eight epic bosses across eight kickass platformer levels.
  • Chester’s Revenge is built using traditional 2d pixel art for the look and feel of the SNES era.
  • Rock out to an epic 8-bit Chiptune Soundtrack that melts your face off and takes you right back to the ’80s.
  • Every boss character is fully voiced and has its own unique backstory.

Epic boss fights

Blast your way through eight epic bosses on your quest to retrieve the Sacred Carrot and claim your vengeance! Take them down one by one in any order you choose. Chester’s Revenge is presented in a non-linear fashion.



JACKIE JUMPS - A whirling tempest of fury. This rocket-fueled rodent is hot-blooded and quick to anger. Never piss off the bunny.


STING TOOTH - This ancient manticore packs a lethal sting and a fiery disposition. Don't get caught in his fury else you'll be burnt to a cinder.


DRAGO DINN - When it comes to sword fighting, there is none better than this feisty reptile of flame. Nobody puts Drago in a corner!

Features

  • Fast responsive ultra-tight controls.
  • Use your trusty arm cannon to annihilate foes and take your revenge.
  • Power up and gain Multiple Firing Modes.
  • Eight epic, multi-phase boss encounters.

By combining our love of retro games, cheesy 80's action heroes, badass guinea pigs, and challenging multi-phase boss encounters, we've created a fresh unique experience the likes of which have never been seen before.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8.1, 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E7300 (2 * 2660) or AMD Athlon II X2 270 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 (2048 MB) or Radeon HD 4850 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7, 8.1, 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G3250 (2*3200) or AMD FX 4350 (4*4200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 (2048 MB) or Radeon RX 560X or GeForce MX 150 or GeForce GTX 970M or Intel UHD 620 or Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
